verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> on the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2540>occasion<s%> there were <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3918>present<s%> who <S%G518>reported<s%> to Him <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1057>Galileans,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> had <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with their <S%G2378>sacrifices.<s%>

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do you <S%G1380>suppose<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1057>Galileans<s%> were [greater] <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> [other] <S%G1057>Galileans,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> [fate?]
"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3780>no,<s%> but <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G3340>repent,<s%> you will <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G622>perish.<s%>

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> do you <S%G1380>suppose<s%> that <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G7037>eighteen<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G4444>tower<s%> in <S%G4611>Siloam<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> and <S%G615>killed<s%> them, were [worse] <S%G3781>culprits<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> who <S%G2730>live<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>?
"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3780>no,<s%> but <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G3340>repent,<s%> you will <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%> <S%G622>perish.<s%>"

And He [began] <S%G3004>telling<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable:<s%> "A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> which had been <S%G5452>planted<s%> in his <S%G290>vineyard;<s%> and he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2212>looking<s%> for <S%G2590>fruit<s%> on it, and did not <S%G2147>find<s%> any.

"And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the vineyard-keeper, <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> for <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I have <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2212>looking<s%> for <S%G2590>fruit<s%> on <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G2532>without<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2147>finding<s%> any. <S%G1581>Cut<s%> it <S%G1581>down!<s%> <S%G2444>Why<s%> does it <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2673>use<s%> up the <S%G1093>ground<s%>?'

"And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G863>'Let<s%> it <S%G863>alone,<s%> <S%G2962>sir,<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G4626>dig<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> it and <S%G906>put<s%> in <S%G2874>fertilizer;<s%>
and <S%G2579>if<s%> it <S%G4160>bears<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1519>next<s%> <S%G3195><s%> year, [fine;] but <S%G1487>if<s%> not, <S%G1581>cut<s%> it <S%G1581>down.<s%>' "
And He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who for <S%G7037>eighteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> had <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G769>sickness<s%> caused by a <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> and she was <S%G4794>bent<s%> <S%G4794>double,<s%> and <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G352>straighten<s%> up at <S%G3838>all.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> her, He <S%G4377>called<s%> her <S%G4377>over<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> you are <S%G630>freed<s%> from your <S%G769>sickness.<s%>"

And He <S%G2007>laid<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon her; and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she was <S%G461>made<s%> <S%G461>erect<s%> <S%G461>again,<s%> and [began] <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G752>official,<s%> <S%G23>indignant<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2323>healed<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> [began] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> in <S%G611>response,<s%> "There are <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> <S%G1163>should<s%> be <S%G2038>done;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> them and <S%G2323>get<s%> <S%G2323>healed,<s%> and not on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

But the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> does not <S%G1538>each<s%> of you on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G3089>untie<s%> his <S%G1016>ox<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G3688>donkey<s%> from the <S%G5336>stall,<s%> and <S%G520>lead<s%> him <S%G520>away<s%> to <S%G4222>water<s%> [him?]

"And <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>woman,<s%> a <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%> as she is, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> has <S%G1210>bound<s%> for <S%G1176>eighteen<s%> <S%G3638><s%> <S%G2400>long<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G1163>should<s%> she not have been <S%G3089>released<s%> from <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1199>bond<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>?"

And as He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> His <S%G480>opponents<s%> were being <S%G2617>humiliated;<s%> and the <S%G3956>entire<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1741>glorious<s%> <S%G1741>things<s%> <S%G1096>being<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> by Him.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> He was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3664>like,<s%> and to <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G3666>compare<s%> it?

"It is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4615>mustard<s%> <S%G2848>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G906>threw<s%> into his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2779>garden;<s%> and it <S%G837>grew<s%> and <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G1186>tree;<s%> and the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2681>nested<s%> in its <S%G2798>branches.<s%>"
And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "To <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G3666>compare<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

"It is <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G2928>hid<s%> in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4568>pecks<s%> of <S%G224>meal,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> it was <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2220>leavened.<s%>"

And He was <S%G1279>passing<s%> <S%G1279>through<s%> from one <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G2968>village<s%> to <S%G2596>another,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching,<s%> and <S%G4160>proceeding<s%> on His <S%G4197>way<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> are there [just] a <S%G3641>few<s%> who are being <S%G4982>saved<s%>?" And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,

<S%G75>"Strive<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> by the <S%G4728>narrow<s%> <S%G2374>door;<s%> for <S%G4183>many,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, will <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> and will not be <S%G2480>able.<s%>

<S%G575>"Once<s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3617>head<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> <S%G1453>gets<s%> up and <S%G608>shuts<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> and you <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> and <S%G2925>knock<s%> on the <S%G2374>door,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G455>open<s%> up to us!' <S%G2532>then<s%> He will <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, 'I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> you are from.'
<S%G5119>"Then<s%> you will <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'We <S%G2068>ate<s%> and <S%G4095>drank<s%> in Your <S%G1799>presence,<s%> and You <S%G1321>taught<s%> in our <S%G4116>streets<s%>';
and He will <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> you are from; <S%G868>depart<s%> from Me, <S%G3956>all<s%> you <S%G93>evildoers.<s%>'

"There will be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> being <S%G1544>cast<s%> out.

"And they will <S%G2240>come<s%> from <S%G395>east<s%> and <S%G1424>west,<s%> and from <S%G1005>north<s%> and <S%G3558>south,<s%> and will <S%G347>recline<s%> [at the table] in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
"And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> [some] are <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will be <S%G4413>first<s%> and [some] are <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will be <S%G2078>last.<s%>"

<S%G846>Just<s%> at that <S%G5610>time<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G1831>"Go<s%> <S%G1831>away<s%> and <S%G4198>depart<s%> from <S%G1782>here,<s%> for <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G2309>wants<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> You."

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G3004>tell<s%> that <S%G258>fox,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> and <S%G658>perform<s%> <S%G2392>cures<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> and <S%G839>tomorrow,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> [day] I <S%G5048>reach<s%> My <S%G5048>goal.<s%>'

<S%G4133>"Nevertheless<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4198>journey<s%> on <S%G4594>today<s%> and <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> and the <S%G2192>next<s%> [day;] for it <S%G1735>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> be that a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> should <S%G622>perish<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

"O <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> [the city] that <S%G615>kills<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G3036>stones<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to her! <S%G4212>How<s%> <S%G4212>often<s%> I <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G1996>gather<s%> your <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1996>together,<s%> <S%G3739>just<s%> <S%G5158><s%> as a <S%G3733>hen<s%> [gathers] her <S%G3555>brood<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> her <S%G4420>wings,<s%> and you <S%G2309>would<s%> not [have it!]

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> your <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G863>left<s%> to you [desolate;] and I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, you shall not <S%G3708>see<s%> Me <S%G2193>until<s%> [the time] <S%G2240>comes<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2127>'Blessed<s%> is He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>'"
